description: This file defines the NotesRepository class, an in-memory thread-safe repository for managing Note objects, including methods for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe in-memory repository for Note objects, supporting CRUD operations and listing with pagination.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the repository with an empty dictionary and a reentrant lock for thread safety.

methods.name: list_notes
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of notes along with the total count, sorted by creation time and ID.

methods.name: get_note
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its UUID, or None if not found.

methods.name: create_note
methods.description: Creates a new Note object with a unique UUID and timestamps, then stores it in the repository.

methods.name: update_note
methods.description: Updates the title and/or content of an existing note and refreshes its updated_at timestamp.

methods.name: delete_note
methods.description: Deletes a note by its UUID, returning True if the note existed and was removed.
